import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card, CardTitle, CardText, Form, FormGroup, Button, Label, Input } from 'reactstrap'; export default function AppLogin(props) { const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [telefono, setTelefono] = useState('') const [info, setInfo] = useState('') const handleChange = (event) =>{ setInfo('') const target = event.target if(target.name === "password"){ setPassword(target.val) } } return ( Log in

{info}
) }
